de.ralleytn.simple.audio

Class Playlist

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.audio.Playlist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playable

    public class Playlist
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playable
    Stores multiple Audios and plays them in a batch. Handy if you want to program an audio player.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Version:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        Description copied from interface: Playable
